name: Outer Atolls
culture_adjustments: heightened clan autonomy; harbor-clans act as micro-states
navigation rites become civic offices with fees
oral contract practice favored over formal literacy
sea-fosterage and multi-clan kin networks common
animist reef-guard rituals prioritized over temple formalism
constraints: reliance on imported reagents for rituals
no heavy industry due to reef foundations
notes: pilotage fees underwrite clan militias and repair yards
minor but vital source of halide salts used in temple rites
